cause.description:
A gathering place for all of those who wish to see Senator Hillary Clinton elected in November 2008 and sworn in in January 2009 to leader of the free world.
Hillary was raised in a middle-class family in the middle of America. From that classic suburban childhood in Park Ridge, Illinois, she went on to become one of America's foremost advocates for children and families; an attorney twice voted one of the most influential in America; a First Lady of Arkansas who helped transform the schools; a bestselling author; a First Lady for America who helped transform that role, becoming a champion for health care and families at home and a champion of women's rights and human rights around the world.
Join Hillary: www.HillaryClinton.com www.HillaryClinton.com/women www.youtube.com/hillaryclinton www.myspace.com/hillaryclinton
Email Hillary at: hillary.clinton@elections.facebook.com
1. Health Care is a Universal Right
2. Easy Access to Education for all
3. Women's Right to choose
4. Restore America to International Respect and Integrity
5. End the War in Iraq and Bring our Troops Home
6. Secure America's Borders and End Terrorism
7. Get the Democrats back in the White House
cause.mission: Elect the most experienced, most caring, and most knowledgeable candidate of world affairs in 2012.
cause.name: Hillary Clinton for President
